group_1.narration: And so Phantom Thief Karin became aware@of her own sins, and resolved to change.
I probably caused a ton of trouble@for a bunch of Magical Girls...
But from now on, I'll fight as @regular Magical Girl: Karin Misono.@I'll fight alongside my friends.

group_1.textCenter: What I'm saying is that the main character@is struggling, but trying to make progress.

group_1.narration: Alina-senpai was so right. I did grow as@a person by learning the value of teamwork.
That's why, from now on, I'm going to team@up with my friends and save everyone.

group_1.textRight: Karin Misono... You...
What are you making me read?!
This is NOT how it should be!
This is terribile! I'm so angry!
This scrap of paper! It is no manga that's@for sure, and now...it's trash!

group_1.textLeft: Trash... But...I found the answer I was@searching for...

group_1.textRight: Ugh, take it back. Rip it up yourself.

group_1.textLeft: I don't care if you're my senpai, that's@too cruel! I can't tear it up!

group_1.textRight: Geeze! I, Alina, was simply telling you@to dispose of your own garbage.
So then, Karin Misono... Are you satisfied@with what you've created?
You're lying.
This can't be how she truly feels! What@does this character truly desire?!
All I want is for her to be true to herself!
But then, this character is you, correct?

group_1.textLeft: B-but, it's a story about Magical Girls, @so...
Wait, are you...a Magical Girl too?

group_1.textRight: I have no idea what you're talking about.
But it reminded me of you.
That heroine is just like you.
That's why I'm so angry!@Sono incazzata!
What does this character truly desire?!@What do YOU truly desire?!
*Slurp* *Gulp* Ahh...
Thanks to you the mood in this classroom@has spoiled.
Goodbye!

group_1.textCenter: I just keep making excuses for myself@and it's all gone wrong...
